mapper.select: SELECT COM_ID comId, COM_NUM comNum, CEO_NAME ceoName, COM_NAME comName, COM_IMG comImg, COM_ADDRESS comAddress, COM_CATEGORY comCategory, COM_HALL comHall, DELIVERYPAY deliveryPay, CEO_ID ceoId, COM_NOTICE comNotice, MIN_PRICE minPrice, MENU_CATEGORY menuCategory, DELIVERYZONE deliveryZone, ORIGIN origin, PRINTFLYERS printFlyers, BUSINESSTIME businessTime, SALESDECLARATION salesDeclaration, COM_NOTICE_IMG comNoticeImg, FREEDELIVERY freeDelivery, COM_PHONE comPhone FROM COMPANY WHERE COM_CATEGORY = #{category}

SELECT COM_ID comId, COM_NUM comNum, CEO_NAME ceoName, COM_NAME comName, COM_IMG comImg, COM_ADDRESS comAddress, COM_CATEGORY comCategory, COM_HALL comHall, DELIVERYPAY deliveryPay, CEO_ID ceoId, COM_NOTICE comNotice, MIN_PRICE minPrice, MENU_CATEGORY menuCategory, DELIVERYZONE deliveryZone, ORIGIN origin, PRINTFLYERS printFlyers, BUSINESSTIME businessTime, SALESDECLARATION salesDeclaration, COM_NOTICE_IMG comNoticeImg, FREEDELIVERY freeDelivery, COM_PHONE comPhone FROM COMPANY WHERE COM_ID = #{comId}

SELECT MENU_ID menuId, MENU_NAME menuName, MENU_PRICE menuPrice, MENU_IMG menuImg, SELL sell, MENU_EXPLAIN menuExplain, MENU_CHOICE menuChoice, COM_ID comId, MENUTITLE_NUM menuTitleNum FROM MENU WHERE COM_ID = #{comId} AND MENUTITLE_NUM = #{menuTitleNum}

SELECT MENU_ID menuId, MENU_NAME menuName, MENU_PRICE menuPrice, MENU_IMG menuImg, SELL sell, MENU_EXPLAIN menuExplain, MENU_CHOICE menuChoice, COM_ID comId, MENUTITLE_NUM menuTitleNum FROM MENU WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASKET (MEM_ID, MENU_ID, COM_ID, MENU_PRICE, MENU_COUNT) VALUES (#{memId}, #{menuId}, #{comId}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuCount})
mapper.select: SELECT B.MEM_ID memId, B.MENU_ID menuId, M.MENU_IMG menuImg, M.MENU_NAME menuName, M.MENU_PRICE menuPrice, B.MENU_COUNT menuCount, M.COM_ID comId, (M.MENU_PRICE*B.MENU_COUNT) totalPrice FROM BASKET B INNER JOIN MENU M ON B.MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID AND B.MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BASKET WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT COM_ID FROM BASKET WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
